definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: Trucks are bringing fresh fruit and vegetables into the city.
sentences.chinese: 卡车把新颖地生果和蔬菜运进都会。

sentences.english: The bulk of our nutritional needs come from fruits, vegetables, and grains.
sentences.chinese: 我们所需的营养大部分都来自于水果，蔬菜和谷物。

sentences.english: Often, they are cold-pressed and extracted from fatty portions of vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 常常，他们冷压萃取脂肪和部分蔬菜。

sentences.english: My friend Tao Jun likes fish and vegetables very much.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友陶军拿非常喜欢鱼和蔬菜。

sentences.english: Tori Ritchie says it's great year-round, and for fish and veggies, too.
sentences.chinese: 托丽里奇说，他是伟大的全年性，为鱼类和蔬菜，太。

sentences.english: She was asked by her mother to go to buy apples at the greengrocer's at the corner.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲要她到转角的蔬菜店去买些苹果回来。

sentences.english: The current vegetable price slump has taken its toll on Chinese farmers.
sentences.chinese: 近日蔬菜价格暴跌使广大的中国菜农损失惨重。

sentences.english: The Anglo-Chinese Vegetable Wholesale Merchants Association Limited.
sentences.chinese: 外蔬菜业批发商会有限公司。

sentences.english: Rice, cotton and vegetable seeds are sometimes grown in special seedbeds.
sentences.chinese: 有时，大米，棉花和蔬菜种子要在苗床培育。

sentences.english: She also practices boxing, planting vegetables on her roof garden, and cooks all by herself.
sentences.chinese: 她还练习拳击，在屋顶花园种蔬菜，自己做饭。

sentences.english: Low-Glycemic-index vegetables are allowed as well as low-fat cheese, nuts, eggs.
sentences.chinese: 低血糖指数的蔬菜被允许以及低脂奶酪，坚果，鸡蛋。

sentences.english: Take more fresh fruit and vegetables. Take health tonics.
sentences.chinese: 多吃鲜果和蔬菜和健康食品。

sentences.english: Can we also order some vegetable spring rolls?
10Shoppers looked for vegetables during a sale of produce from the city of Iwaki in Fukushima prefecture on April 12, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 在福岛县的盘城郡，购物者正在购买蔬菜。

sentences.english: The characteristics of phosphorus absorption in soil under the condition of different fertilizations was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同施肥处理的蔬菜保护地土壤磷的吸附特性。

sentences.english: The vegetable skewer's saving grace is the Yakitori sauce.
sentences.chinese: 日式串烧的酱料可说是蔬菜串烧的救星。

definition: variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
